comments: This course included a lot of work, but a large number of reviewers made the claim that this must be among the best courses taught at Penn.  Students praised Prof. Jamieson for her ability to foster learning, rather than just get through the material.  Many students said that this course required the most work they had ever done for a course, but that it was well worth it.  A few students expressed displeasure over the large number of guest lectures, however.
